name: Papa's Chocolate Shop
description:
Serve Customers ASAP! This is an awesome Chocolate Making Arcade-Style Game. Create & Serve Dozens of Delicious & Unique Chocolates and desserts out of Your Own Chocolate Shop.
Decorate and Update your Shop as you like.
------------------------------------------------------
Here's the scoop, your shop is waiting and it's time to make some fantastic chocolates to serve to your customers! Arcade-style game will keep you on your toes, timing you as you make different kinds of chocolates and serve your customers quickly. Make sure you get the order right!
